solution_line_template: Two weeks are {nathan_weeks} * {days_per_week} = <<{nathan_weeks}*{days_per_week}={nathan_days}>>{nathan_days} days, so Nathan played for {nathan_hours_per_day} * {nathan_days} = <<{nathan_days}*{nathan_hours_per_day}={nathan_total_hours}>>{nathan_total_hours} hours.
Tobias played for {days_per_week} days, so he played a total of {tobias_hours_per_day} * {days_per_week} = <<{tobias_hours_per_day}*{days_per_week}={tobias_total_hours}>>{tobias_total_hours} hours.
Nathan and Tobias played together for {nathan_total_hours} + {tobias_total_hours} = <<{nathan_total_hours}+{tobias_total_hours}={total_play_hours}>>{total_play_hours} hours.
